mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME, PROMOTIONNO) VALUES((SELECT nvl(MAX(REVIEWNO) ,0)+1 FROM REVIEW), #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE , #{id}, #{name},#{promotionNO})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE REVIEWNO=#{reviewNO}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME, PROMOTIONNO FROM REVIEW where id=#{id}
